pr_title: KOGITO-3615 Build OptaPlanner to catch regressions early

timeline.message: KOGITO-3615 Build OptaPlanner to catch regressions early

timeline.bodyText: Just thinking that optaplanner should be done before kogito-examples because some examples are using optaplanner and we want to be sure to have latest version in there
timeline.author: radtriste

replies.bodyText: It means a slight delay of kogito-examples' test results, but hardly anyone probably checks partial results.
replies.author: rsynek

timeline.message: KOGITO-3615 Build OptaPlanner to catch regressions early

timeline.bodyText:

                                checkoutRepo("kogito-examples")

timeline.author: radtriste

replies.bodyText: sorry for nitpicking but let's keep the same order :)
replies.author: radtriste
